# Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and files generated by popular Visual Studio add-ons.

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# User-specific files (Mono)
mono_crash.*

# Build results
[Dd]ebug/
[Rr]elease/
x64/
x86/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]64/
bld/
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
[Ll]og/
[Ll]ogs/

# Visual Studio 2019/2022 cache/options directory
.vscode/
.vs/
.vs/*

# Visual Studio 2019/2022 build artifacts
Project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json
artifacts/

# .NET Core
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json
artifacts/
**/bin/
**/obj/

# ASP.NET Scaffolding
ScaffoldingReadMe.txt

# Azure Web App
.scm/
.scmignore

# Auto-generated by NuGet
packages/
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
*.nuget.props
*.nuget.targets
.nuget/

# MSBuild binaries
build/
publish/

# Recycle Bin used by Visual Studio
*.ide~

# Windows image file caches
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db

# Folder config file
Desktop.ini

# Recycle Bin used by Windows
$RECYCLE.BIN/

# Backup file
*.bak
*.old
*.orig

# SQL Server Integration Services
.ssmssln
.ssmsproj

# Windows Installer files
*.cab
*.msi
*.msm
*.msp

# SQL Server database files
*.mdf
*.ldf

# Rider files
.idea/
.idea/**/workspace.xml
.idea/**/tasks.xml

# Ignore secrets and sensitive information
secrets.json
appsettings.*.json
